cause.description:
Relay For Life® One day. One night. One community. Your Relay For Life® is about celebration, remembrance, and hope. By participating, you honor cancer survivors, pay tribute to the lives we've lost to the disease, and raise money to help fight it – all right here in your community. You won't want to miss one moment of this life- and community-affirming event! This is a 24 hour event designed to honor those battling cancer, remember those lost, and to raise money in order to fund research to find a cure.
1. Find a cure for cancer.
cause.mission: Raise money for the American Cancer Society to help in the battle against cancer.
cause.name: FIU Relay for Life
